froze the rainwater? Because I was thirsty. Because I was building a pool. Because I hated Grimoire.

136533.<pipipi_low><shake_big>「そんな理由で あんなに怒っただな:
<pipipi_low><shake_big>I can't believe he got so mad at you for that
reason! You can't forgive him! You're never
going to make up with him, are you?

136534.<pipipi_low>「ま…まさか 青の巨人ブルメルも\n プクリポちゃんと遊:
No way! Blue Giant Blumel was also trying to build a pool to play with Puk Lipo-chan? Oh, is that so? Then I guess we all had the same
goal, but we all jumped the gun and got into a fight. I guess I'm starting to feel a little sad. How stupid we were! Thanks to you, I
think I can forgive both of us who have been fighting for a long time.

136542.<pipipi_low>「オイラは この地に住んでるプクリポちゃんと\n 仲良く:
I wanted to make friends with Puk Lipo-chan, who lives here, so we tried to play together in a big skating rink made of frozen
rainwater. The red brothers' fire melted the ice for that purpose, and the blue brothers were unreasonably angry with them, so we had a
fight with them! I'm surprised that all of us were trying to be friends with Puk Lipo-chan! Thanks to you, I think I can forgive the two
of them who have been fighting for so long.

136543.緑の巨人グリモアの 説得に成功したようだ。\nほかの巨人も説得して\n３つのキノ:
Green Giant Greemor seems to have succeeded in persuading the other giants to join him. Let's persuade the other giants and unite the hearts
of the three mushrooms.

136544.<pipipi_low>「ありがとう。きみのおかげで 長い期間 \n ケンカした:
Thank you. Thanks to you, I think we can forgive each other for the long time we've been fighting. We've been like this for a long
time now, but I'm sure we'll be able to get back together again soon. Until that day, I'll sleep and wait.

136546.赤の巨人レドノフは\nどうやら 眠っているようだ。: Red Giant Rednov is apparently asleep.

136547.<pipipi_low>「ありがとな。お前のおかげで ずっと\n ケンカしたまま:
Thanks to you. Thanks to you, I think I can forgive them now that we've been fighting for so long. We've been in this form for a long

136549.青の巨人ブルメルは\nどうやら 眠っているようだ。: Blue Giant Blumel is apparently sleeping.
